capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that she's still in elementary school at this age.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent character in the Harry Potter series. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i didn't know that you're a woman, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is a great example of a strong and intelligent female character in literature. I think she's an amazing role model for young girls everywhere, don't you?

Hermione is an amazing role model, you know? I mean, she's so intelligent and resourceful. As a woman in the wizarding world, it's impressive that she's able to hold her own against the likes of Harry Potter and Ron Weasley. I think her determination and quick thinking are really admirable.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's magic wand is definitely one of his most notable possessions. I mean, it's hard to imagine him without it, you know? The fact that he chose a wand made of holly wood with a phoenix feather core really suited his personality and style. It's just so iconic in the wizarding world now.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's got a pretty impressive collection of magical artifacts, and that wand is definitely one of the most iconic ones out there. I mean, it's said to be made from holly wood with a phoenix feather core - can you imagine wielding something so powerful? It's no wonder he was able to cast those incredible spells throughout his adventures at Hogwarts.

You know, I've always been fascinated by the idea that Harry's magic wand is a part of him. It's like an extension of his own power and abilities. I think it's really cool how the wand chooses the wizard, rather than the other way around. (CERTAINTY: high) (POLARITY: positive) (SENTIMENT: excitement) (EMOTION: awe)
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He had this incredible magic-wand that was truly one of a kind. I mean, it's not just any ordinary wand, but a wand that chose him, you know? It's like it sensed the good in him and decided to be his partner in all those adventures.
